title: Lesson 02 - One Minute Russian
description: In lesson 2 of One Minute Russian you will learn a few more useful words in Russian which you'll use every day. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Russian on our website at http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. One Minute Russian is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
